name: Elisius
description:
Survive or thrive in this fantasy land, built by the ancient and powerful Time Lord. This mysterious entity has brought some of the greatest warriors from different periods on Earth to a realm of his own creation, named Elisius. He means to observe and study them through deadly tests in order to gain more knowledge of the universe. You are one of these warriors, and with up to 3 other friends, you must complete these tests in order to gain massive heaps of gold and weapons.

The nature of Elisius grants every warrior special abilities, which let you harness the Time Lord's magic to access powers beyond your wildest dreams. Use the money earned from the arena to upgrade your weapons, gain prestige, and get new abilities. Whether destroying a goblin as a Viking with a machinegun or slaying a giant beaver with a stick, Elisius offers many strange and unique weapon and character combinations for you to dominate the arena with.

The land of Elisius is not forgiving, but the arena offers plenty of rewards for those who succeed, so go out and impress the Time Lord with your skill! It's not like you have another option....
